title: In One Jamaican Town, Hurricane Melissa Left Behind Floodwaters and Dead Livestock
summary: The Category 5 storm ravaged western Jamaica and drenched the small community of New River, where residents were coping with a massive clean up. At least 19 people have died nationwide, officials said.

summary: In Guillermo del Toro’s new version, the answer lies in how deeply it explores the relationship between creator and created.

title: The Ubiquitous Flower That Marks the Day of the Dead
summary: During the Day of the Dead, the cempasúchil, or marigold, is believed to guide spirits back home. In Mexico City, people who lost a loved one to Covid use the flower to honor their dead.
